name: Chase and the Rainbow
description:
Chase, a funny little red-haired elf, must collect coins to fill each empty pot. However, he can only travel by rainbow! Press and hold the Space Bar to grow a rainbow, and let go to travel it. Use the arrow keys to change directions.

Game Assets:

Character - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/free-2d-game-character-5/

Tileset - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/platformer-game-tile-set-3-350/

Coins - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/8x8-free-coin-gem-collection/

Pot of Gold - https://www.gamedeveloperstudio.com/graphics/viewgraphic.php?page-name=Pot-of-go...

Hornet - https://www.gamedeveloperstudio.com/graphics/viewgraphic.php?page-name=Hornet&it...

Electric Effect - https://www.gamedeveloperstudio.com/graphics/viewgraphic.php?page-name=Electric-...

Clouds - https://craftpix.net/product/backgrounds-for-vertical-jump-2d-game/
